livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 1 # Node Rules for Bazel (unsupported)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 2
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 3 Rules | Description
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 4 --- | ---
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 5 [node_binary] | Creates a node binary.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 6 [node_library] | Groups node.js sources and deps together.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 7 [npm_library] | Defines an external npm module.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 8 [node_internal_module] | Create an internal node module that can be required as `require('module_name')`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 9 [webpack_build] | Build JS/CSS/etc with webpack.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 10 [node_build] | Build JS/CSS/etc with a node binary.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 11 [mocha_test] | Defines a node test that uses mocha.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 12 [node_test] | Defines a basic node test.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 13
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 14 ## Overview
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 15
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 16 These rules are a public copy of what we're using at [Dropbox]. We
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 17 open sourced them because we think the community will benefit from
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 18 seeing how we've done things, but they are not supported. Pull
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 19 requests are welcome, though!
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 20
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 21 We encourage you use the officially sanctioned
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 22 [nodejs][bazelbuild-rules_nodejs] or
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 23 [typescript][bazelbuild-rules_typescript] rules instead, if possible!
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 24
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 25 A brief overview:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 26
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 27 - [node_binary], [node_library], [mocha_test], [node_test] all work
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 28 the way you would expect them to.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 29
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 30 - [npm_library] downloads npm modules from the public npm repository. We
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 31 have a fair amount of tooling within Dropbox to support this rule,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 32 with a private mirror and way to generate `npm_library` rules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 33 Simpler versions of those tools are included in
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 34 [node/tools/npm][npm-tooling]. If you're using this rule for
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 35 serious development, you should replace the `npm_installer` with
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 36 something that pulls from an internal mirror.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 37
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 38 - [webpack_build] uses webpack to build js/css files. Making the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 39 experience of using webpack better within Dropbox was one of the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 40 reasons we wrote these rules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 41
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 42 - [node_internal_module] is used to create an "internal" node module
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 43 so that you can easily share code without having to upload it to
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 44 npm.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 45
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 46
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 47 ### Design decisions
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 48
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 49 - As much as possible, we try to create a "normal" node environment
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 50 in the runfiles for node binaries. This simplifies debugging (it's
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 51 easier to create test cases without Bazel) and reduces the learning
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 52 curve for node developers.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 53
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 54 - We use the `--preserve-symlinks` so that node doesn't get the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 55 realpath of the file and look up the node_modules outside of its
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 56 runfiles.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 57
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 58 - The `node_modules` folder is created in the runfiles and is placed
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 59 in the package directory that contains the `node_binary` target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 60 This simplifies things because you can have the `main` for a binary
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 61 be inside its `node_modules`. For example:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 62
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 63 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 64 node_binary(
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 65 name = 'webpack_bin',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 66 main = 'node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 67 deps = ['//npm/webpack'],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 68 )
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 69 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 70
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 71 - The `contents` attr for `npm_library` is a list of strings that are
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 72 turned into files instead of a list of labels because files have
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 73 fewer character restrictions.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 74
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 75 - Compiled node modules are not currently supported.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 76
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 77
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 78 ### Examples
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 79
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 80 See [examples].
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 81
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 82
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 83 ## Setup
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 84
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 85 First you must [install][bazel-install] Bazel.

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 87 ### Linux
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 88
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 89 For Linux, you must add the following to your `WORKSPACE` file:

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 91 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 92 load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:git.bzl", "git_repository")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 93

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 95 name = "org_dropbox_rules_node",
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 96 remote = "https://github.com/dropbox/rules_node.git",
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 97 commit = "{HEAD}",
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 98 )

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 100 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "node_repositories")

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 102 node_repositories()
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 103 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 104
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 105 This will pull in node v6.11.1 built for linux-x64. If you want to use
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 106 another version of node, you should pass `omit_nodejs=True` and define
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 107 another version of `nodejs` in your `WORKSPACE` file.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 108

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 131 url = "https://nodejs.org/dist/v6.11.1/node-v6.11.1-darwin-x64.tar.gz",

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 137
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 138 This will pull in node v6.11.1 built for macOS.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 139
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 140 # Rules
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 141
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 142 ## `node_binary`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 143
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 144 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 145 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "node_binary")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 146 node_binary(name, main, srcs, deps, data, extra_args, node, max_old_memory, expose_gc)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 147 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 148
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 149 Creates a node binary, which is an executable Node program consisting
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 150 of a collection of `.js` source files.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 151
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 152 Node binaries are created using `--preserve-symlinks`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 153
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 154 One quirk of this rule is that if your script uses the pattern:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 155
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 156 ```javascript
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 157 if (require.main === module) {
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 158 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 159
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 160 to only execute something if the node script is the "main" script,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 161 you'll need to modify it to check `BAZEL_NODE_MAIN_ID` against the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 162 module id instead, like this:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 163
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 164 ```javascript
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 165 if (process.env['BAZEL_NODE_MAIN_ID'] === module.id || require.main === module) {
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 166 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 167
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 168 All node modules that this rule depends on, direct and transitive, end
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 169 up flattened in `{package-directory}/node_modules`, where
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 170 `package-directory` is the directory that the node_binary target
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 171 is it. This means that, across all of your transitive dependencies
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 172 tracked by Bazel, you can't depend on different versions of the same
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 173 node module. (This does not apply to transitive dependencies of
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 174 npm_library rules, which are not tracked by Bazel.)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 175
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 176 The environmental variable `NODE_PATH` is set to
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 177 `{package-directory}/node_modules` so that all the files that end up
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 178 running can find all the included node modules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 179
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 180 One side-effect of that is that node libraries have access to all the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 181 transitive dependencies for the node binary that depends on them.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 182
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 183 Examples:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 184
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 185 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 186 node_binary(
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 187 name = 'mybin',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 188 srcs = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 189 'mybin.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 190 ],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 191 main = 'mybin.js',

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 193 '//npm/loose-envify',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 194 '//npm/minimist',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 195 '//npm/mkdirp',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 196 ],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 197 )
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 198 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 199
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 200 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 201 node_library(
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 202 name = 'lib',

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 214 ],

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 216 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 217
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 218 ### Arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 219
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 220 - **name:** ([Name]; required) A unique name for this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 221
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 222 - **main:** ([Label]; required) The name of the source file that is the main entry point of the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 223 application.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 224
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 225 - **srcs:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of source files that are processed to create the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 226
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 227 - **deps:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of other libraries included in the binary target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 228
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 229 - **data:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of files needed by this binary at runtime.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 230
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 231 - **extra_args:** (List of strings; optional) Command line arguments that bazel will pass to the target when it
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 232 is executed either by the `run` command or as a test. These arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 233 are passed before the ones that are specified on the `bazel run` or
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 234 `bazel test` command line.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 235
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 236 - **node:** ([Label]; defaults to `@nodejs//:node`) The node binary used to run the binary. Must be greater than 6.2.0.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 237
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 238 - **max_old_memory:** (Integer; optional) Node, by default, doesn't run its garbage collector on old space
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 239 until a maximum old space size limit is reached. This overrides the default (of around 1.4gb)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 240 with the provided value in MB.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 241
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 242 - **expose_gc:** (Boolean; optional) Expose `global.gc()` in the node process to allow manual requests for
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 243 garbage collection.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 244
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 245 ## `node_library`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 246
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 247 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 248 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "node_library")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 249 node_library(name, srcs, deps, data)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 250 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 251
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 252 Groups node.js sources and deps together. Similar to [py_library] rules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 253
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 254 **NOTE:** This does not create an internal module that you can then `require`. For that, you need to use [node_internal_module].
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 255
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 256 ### Arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 257
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 258 - **name:** ([Name]; required) A unique name for this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 259
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 260 - **srcs:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of source files that are processed to create the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 261
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 262 - **deps:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of other libraries or node modules needed to be linked into
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 263 the target library.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 264
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 265 - **data:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of files needed by this library at runtime.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 266
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 267 ## `npm_library`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 268
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 269 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 270 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "npm_library")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 271 npm_library(name, npm_req, no_import_main_test, shrinkwrap, contents,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 272 npm_installer, npm_installer_args)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 273 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 274
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 275 Defines an external npm module.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 276
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 277 This rule should usually be generated using `//node/tools/npm:gen_build_npm`, like this:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 278
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 279 ```bash
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 280 bazel run @org_dropbox_rules_node//node/tools/npm:gen_build_npm -- my-module@1.2.3 ~/myrepo/npm/my-module
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 281 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 282
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 283 The module and its dependencies are downloaded using `npm_installer`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 284
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 285 All of the module's dependencies are declared in the shrinkwrap but
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 286 aren't known by Bazel. This is to work around Bazel's restrictions on
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 287 circular dependencies, which are commonplace in the node ecosystem. By
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 288 doing things this way, Bazel will know about your direct `npm`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 289 dependencies, but not your indirect dependencies.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 290
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 291 One restriction that this rule places on it's output is that all
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 292 the files output must either be in the module's directory or in
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 293 '.bin'. E.g. if the module is named `module-name`, then this list
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 294 of contents is legal:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 295
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 296 contents = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 297 'module-name/src/something.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 298 '.bin/some-binary',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 299 ]
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 300
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 301 But this list of contents is not:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 302
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 303 contents = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 304 'module-name/src/something.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 305 'another-modules/something-else.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 306 ]
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 307
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 308 This allows us to be reasonably sure that any two modules can be
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 309 used together (except when '.bin' has conflicts, which should be
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 310 rare).
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 311
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 312 ### Arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 313
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 314 - **name:** ([Name]; required) A unique name for this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 315
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 316 - **npm_req:** (String; required) The npm string used to download this module. Must be in the form `module-name@1.2.3`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 317
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 318 - **no_import_main_test:** (Boolean; defaults to `False`) Don't test that the npm library can be required as if it has a main file.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 319
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 320 We test that all imports can be imported like: `require('module')`. For some imports that don't
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 321 have a `main` js file to execute, this import will fail. For example, `@types/` npm modules will
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 322 fail. Set this to True to disable that check.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 323
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 324 NOTE: This rule will still generate a test to make sure that module version is correct.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 325
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 326 - **shrinkwrap:** (String; required) The shrinkwrap file that lists out all the node modules to install. Should usually be `npm-shrinkwrap.json`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 327
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 328 - **contents:** (List of strings; required) All of the files included in the module.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 329
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 330 This should usually be autogenerated.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 331
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 332 `contents` is a string list instead of a label list to get around Bazel's restrictions on
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 333 label names, which are violated by npm packages pretty often. Some restrictions still exist,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 334 like the restriction that file names cannot contain whitespace.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 335
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 336 - **npm_installer:** ([Label]; defaults to `@org_dropbox_rules_node//node/tools/npm:install) The binary to use to install the npm modules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 337
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 338 The default npm_installer downloads them from the public npm registry, but ideally you
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 339 should replace it with a binary that downloads from your private mirror.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 340
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 341 - **npm_installer_args:** (List of strings; optional) Extra arguments to pass to `npm_installer`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 342
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 343 ## `node_internal_module`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 344
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 345 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 346 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "node_internal_module")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 347 node_internal_module(name, srcs, deps, data, require_name, package_json, main)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 348 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 349
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 350 Create an internal node module that can be included in the `deps` for
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 351 other rules and that can be required as `require('module_name')`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 352
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 353 The module name used to require the module (i.e.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 354 `require('module_name')`) defaults to the name of the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 355
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 356 ### Arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 357
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 358 - **name:** ([Name]; required) A unique name for this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 359
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 360 - **srcs:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of source files that are processed to create the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 361
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 362 - **deps:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of other libraries included in the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 363
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 364 - **data:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of files needed by this target at runtime.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 365
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 366 - **require_name:** (String; optional) The name for the internal node module. E.g.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 367 if `require_name = "my-module"`, it should be used like
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 368 `require('my-module')`. The default is the target name.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 369
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 370 - **package_json:** (String; optional) The package.json for the project. Cannot be
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 371 specified along with `main`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 372
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 373 - **main:** (String; optional) Defaults to the `main` field in the package.json or
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 374 `index.js` if that doesn't exist. Cannot be specified along with
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 375 `package_json`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 376
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 377 ## `webpack_build`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 378
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 379 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 380 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "webpack_build")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 381 webpack_build(name, srcs, deps, data, outs, extra_args, env, config,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 382 webpack_target)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 383 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 384
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 385 Build JS/CSS/etc with webpack.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 386
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 387 It's recommend that you use the internal node module `dbx-bazel-utils`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 388 (`@org_dropbox_rules_node//node/dbx-bazel-utils`). If you use it like
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 389 this:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 390
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 391 ```javascript
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 392 var dbxBazelUtils = require('dbx-bazel-utils');
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 393 var env = dbxBazelUtils.initBazelEnv(__dirname);
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 394 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 395
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 396 Then it will set the working directory to the directory that contains
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 397 webpack.config.js, which is usually what you want, and you should
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 398 output to the directory in `env.outputRoot`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 399
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 400 If the webpack build is run outside of Bazel, then `env.outputRoot`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 401 will be `__dirname`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 402
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 403 Defaults to using webpack@3.4.1. You can specify your own webpack
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 404 target with `webpack_target`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 405
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 406 Examples:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 407
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 408 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 409 # webpack_build/BUILD
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 410 load('@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl', 'webpack_build')
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 411
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 412 webpack_build(
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 413 name = 'webpack_build',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 414 srcs = glob([
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 415 'src/*.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 416 ]),
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 417 outs = ['bundle.js'],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 418 config = 'webpack.config.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 419 deps = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 420 '@org_dropbox_rules_node//node/dbx-bazel-utils',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 421 ],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 422 )
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 423 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 424
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 425 ```javascript
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 426 // webpack_build/webpack.config.js
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 427 var path = require('path');
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 428 var dbxBazelUtils = require('dbx-bazel-utils');

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 430

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 432 entry: ['entry.ts'],

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 439
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 440 ### Arguments

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 446 - **deps:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of other libraries included in the target.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 447

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 449
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 450 - **outs:** (List of [labels]; required) The list of files output by this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 451
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 452 - **extra_args:** (List of strings; optional) The list of additional args for this build.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 453

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 455
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 456 - **config:** ([Label]; required) The webpack.config.js file.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 457

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 459
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 460 ## `node_build`
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 461
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 462 ```bzl
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 463 load("@org_dropbox_rules_node//node:defs.bzl", "node_build")
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 464 node_build(name, outs, data, builder, extra_args, env, optimize_flag)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 465 ```
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 466
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 467 Build JS/CSS/etc with a node binary.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 468
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 469 This is a low-level rule, and is only recommended for completely
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 470 custom node builds. If you're using webpack, you should use the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 471 [webpack_build] rule. If you're using another standard JS build system
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 472 (rollup, gulp, grunt, ...), you should write a macro that follows the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 473 conventions of [webpack_build].
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 474
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 475 This rule does not have a `srcs` attribute because it expects all the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 476 srcs needed for the build to be included in the `builder` binary.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 477
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 478 The environmental variable `BAZEL_OUTPUT_DIR` is set for all builds.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 479 The `builder` binary should output to that directory.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 480
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 481 ### Arguments
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 482
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 483 - **name:** ([Name]; required) A unique name for this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 484
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 485 - **data:** (List of [labels]; optional) The list of files needed by this target at runtime.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 486
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 487 - **outs:** (List of [labels]; required) The list of files output by this rule.

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 505 Defines a node test that uses mocha. Takes the same args as
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 506 `node_binary`, except that you can't pass a `main` arg,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 507 because mocha is run as the main js file.

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 510 can change those dependencies by setting `mocha_target` and
